item.title: Black Academy Award winners
item.description: African-American Oscar winners in acting
item.ExtractedText: Black Academy Award winners Updated 1422 GMT (2222 HKT) January 22, 2016 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Hattie McDaniel was the first African-American to win an Academy Award, snagging a best supporting actress Oscar in 1940 for her role as Mammy in "Gone With The Wind." Hide Caption 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners In 1964, Sidney Poitier won best actor for "Lilies of the Field." Hide Caption 2 of 14 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Louis Gossett Jr. poses in 1983 with his best supporting actor award for his role in "An Officer and a Gentleman." Hide Caption 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Denzel Washington accepts his best supporting actor Oscar for the film "Glory" in 1990. Hide Caption 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Her role in "Ghost" won Whoopi Goldberg a best supporting actress trophy in 1991. Hide Caption 5 of 14 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Cuba Gooding Jr. throws his Oscar into the air after being named best supporting actor for his role in "Jerry Maguire" in 1997. Hide Caption 6 of 14 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Denzel Washington became the first African-American to win two Oscars in the acting categories when he won best actor in 2002 for "Training Day." Hide Caption 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners 2002 also saw Halle Berry win the best actress Oscar for "Monster's Ball." Hide Caption 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Jamie Foxx won best actor for "Ray" in 2005. Hide Caption 9 of 14 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Morgan Freeman picked up the Oscar for best supporting actor for his role in "Million Dollar Baby" in 2005. Hide Caption 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners "The Last King of Scotland" star Forest Whitaker won best actor in 2007. Hide Caption 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Jennifer Hudson won the best supporting actress Oscar for "Dreamgirls" in 2007. Hide Caption 12 of 14 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners In 2009, Mo'Nique was named best supporting actress for her role in "Precious: Based on the Novel 'Push' by Sapphire." Hide Caption 13 of 14 14 photos: Black Academy Award winners Lupita Nyong'o won the best supporting actress Oscar in 2014 for her role in "12 Years a Slave." Hide Caption
